title: CORE Policy
description: The canonical schema for all constitutional policy files in .intent/charter/policies/.

id.description: The unique, snake_case identifier for the policy, matching the file name (e.g., 'agent_policy').

version.description: The semantic version of the policy document.

title.description: A human-readable, Title Case name for the policy.

purpose.description: A concise, one or two-sentence explanation of why this policy exists.

status.description: The current lifecycle status of the policy.

owners.description: Defines the roles responsible for maintaining this policy.

review.description: Specifies the review cadence for this policy.
